original_title: Never recommended to postpone elections, says IMF
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The International Monetary Fund said that it does not intervene in local election processes.
Masahiro Nozaki, IMF Mission Chief for Sri Lanka said that the IMF does not intervene in local election processes.
He added that the IMF has never recommended postponing local election in Sri Lanka.
President makes special statement to Parliament after tabling IMF report
The Ugandan parliament has approved a bill that would impose imprisonment on individuals who identify as gay
IMF Bailout: President to make special statement, and will table agreement in Parliament
